implementation.description: Deploy canaries across multiple regions and availability zones for redundancy

controls.description: Manage accounts that have access to CloudWatch Synthetics resources

implementation.description: Use AWS IAM to create and manage user accounts with appropriate permissions for Synthetics operations

implementation.description: Implement resource-based policies and IAM policies to control access to specific canaries and operations

cost.name: AWS CloudWatch Synthetics Cost Optimization Best Practices

controls.title: Optimize Canary Execution Frequency
controls.description: Right-size canary execution frequency based on business requirements to reduce unnecessary runs

implementation.description: Configure canary schedules to run only as frequently as needed for effective monitoring, avoiding over-monitoring

controls.title: Implement Canary Lifecycle Management
controls.description: Regularly review and decommission unused or redundant canaries

implementation.description: Establish processes to identify and remove canaries that are no longer needed or are duplicating monitoring coverage

controls.title: Optimize CloudWatch Logs Retention
controls.description: Set appropriate log retention periods for Synthetics canary logs to control storage costs

implementation.description: Configure CloudWatch log group retention periods based on compliance and operational requirements rather than using indefinite retention

controls.title: Use Appropriate Canary Runtime Versions
controls.description: Select the most cost-effective runtime version that meets functional requirements

implementation.description: Choose canary runtime versions that provide required functionality without unnecessary overhead or premium features

controls.title: Monitor and Alert on Canary Costs
controls.description: Implement cost monitoring and alerting for CloudWatch Synthetics usage

implementation.description: Set up AWS Cost Explorer and CloudWatch billing alarms to track Synthetics costs and receive notifications for unexpected increases

controls.title: Optimize Screenshot and HAR File Storage
controls.description: Configure appropriate retention and compression settings for canary artifacts

implementation.description: Set S3 lifecycle policies for canary artifact buckets to transition older screenshots and HAR files to cheaper storage classes or delete them after specified periods
